1450101.name: Lion Roar
1450101.desc: When opponents are shooting, +10% to goalkeeping and shout at the shooter to reduce their confidence (attack -10%)
1450101.desc_cn: 对手射门时，守门属性提高10%，并对射门者怒吼，降低其信心，使其进攻属性降低10%
1450101.desc_en: When opponents are shooting, +10% to goalkeeping and shout at the shooter to reduce their confidence (attack -10%)

1450102.name: Lion Roar
1450102.desc: When opponents are shooting, +20% to goalkeeping and shout at the shooter to reduce their confidence (attack -20%)
1450102.desc_cn: 对手射门时，守门属性提高20%，并对射门者怒吼，降低其信心，使其进攻属性降低20%

1450103.name: Lion Roar
